name: BEE RUSH (Pierre-Louis)
description:
BEE RUSH is a platerformer game, you play Alan a guy who is determined to cross a bee nature reserve.

Your goal is to cross this place and get out alive

Fortunately you will find a gun to defend yourself !

My name is Pierre-Louis Dulieu and i created this game for a game at IIM "thelastjam"

It is a four day projet and i worked alone. I used the "DevGameRPG" pack. for the game assets.

In this version the game last  ≈ 5-10 minutes, has one tutorial and five levels.

(full screen is CRTL +F)
